name: Most Likely To: Dirty Game
description:
Most Likely To is a drinking game, created for party animals, teens, college students, college dropouts, bachelorettes and all the other party people that want to drink to start their night.

Game can be played offline, without WIFI, and it consists of a bunch of cards you read to your friends.

We made this game because you and your friends are boring and you can’t come up with funny stuff that gets you drunk yourself.

-----! FEATURES !-----
- 800+ Cards
- 9 Packs
- Hours of getting to know your friends
- For 2 players minimum
- Hours of fun
- Hating your friends in the end
- Public embarrassment and disappointment

-----! HOW TO PLAY !-----
- Gather at least 2 friends (if you don’t have any ask your parents to pretend they like you)
- Read the cards out loud.
- Everyone points to the person they think is described in the cards.
- Person with the most fingers pointed at them take a drink.
- If you are stupid and want to hurt your liver then play by taking one drink for each finger pointed at you.
